name: messageformat
author: Alex Sexton <alexsexton@gmail.com>
description: PluralFormat and SelectFormat Message and i18n Tool - A JavaScript Implemenation of the ICU standards.

scripts.test: bin/messageformat.js --module --locale en --include example/en/colors.json -o test/common-js-generated-test-fixture.js; mocha --require test/common --reporter spec --growl test/tests.js
